summary: Don't you wish you could just press the space-bar to skip carriage ride animation when starting a new game?
descriptionHtml:
I know... I know... [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557]Alternate Start Live Another Life[/url] rocks, but this is simply a setting built into Skyrim itself which
bypasses the carriage ride and lets you choose who you wish to follow.
Ralof or Hadvar starting the Unbound quest.
It sure would be great to have this scenario added for [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9557]Alternate Start Live Another Life[/url] wink, wink.. nudge nudge. Whoever knows how to do that. Tell Mara statue "A dragon saved me from the executioner"


Seems to be compatible with Opening Scene Overhaul. Load Ralof or Hadvar after it.
I don't think its compatible with any mod that alters the beginning of the game.
[b]
Update
-180323[/b]
Fixed Helgen. Helgen is now burning When exiting dungeon and works as
originally intended. After 3 days the fires will die. After 4 days and
telling the Whiterun Jarl Balgruuf that Helgen was attacked. Bandits will
takeover Helgen. Make sure to exit through Dragon's Reach doors and not
just teleport out.

There are no scripts. Updating the mod should fix any Helgen issues.

Same version works for Skyrim32 and Skyrim64
author: whatever
